item.title: What is rebase?
item.description: Imagine you and a co-worker are in charge of tickets A and B for a new feature. Let’s say it is on the feature branch. Your co-worker completed the ticket before you do and this is how the branch looks like when you are ready to submit your PR: In your local history, your work has the index(or SHA) of 2 but on the feature branch 2 is B. We want to maintain a linear commit history and avoid as many merge conflicts as we can.
